# PlainCompare — plaincompare.com

> Compare U.S. cities and states side by side across 7 data dimensions.

PlainCompare is a free comparison tool that pulls live data from 7 official U.S. government databases:
1. Cost of Living (BEA Regional Price Parities)
2. Rent (HUD Fair Market Rents)
3. Crime (FBI UCR)
4. Wages (BLS Occupational Employment Statistics)
5. Schools (NCES Common Core of Data)
6. Childcare (DOL Women's Bureau)
7. Environment (EPA ECHO)

## Coverage
- 387 metro areas
- 51 states and territories
- 1,000+ pre-computed popular comparison pairs

## Key Pages
- /compare/{city-a}-vs-{city-b} — Metro comparison (3 dimensions: cost, rent, wages)
- /compare/states/{state-a}-vs-{state-b} — State comparison (all 7 dimensions)
- /rankings — Rankings across all dimensions
- /metros — Browse all metro areas
- /states — Browse all states

## Data
All data comes from official U.S. government sources. Not affiliated with any government agency.

## Contact
Part of the Kiznis Studio network — https://kiznis.studio
